Articles.Content:
I am having some trouble loading my quik saves. I tryd google and searched forum some. But even if i hold f5 and it says "quicksaving... "  when i try to hold f9 it says "hold f9 to loade quicksave" But even if i hold it for 30 sec nothing happens. What am i doing wrong?

 

Other than that game works like a charm! no Game-crashes what so ever

Edited July 31, 2016 by Skubaben

33 minutes ago, Skubaben said:

I am having some trouble loading my quik saves. I tryd google and searched forum some. But even if i hold f5 and it says "quicksaving... "  when i try to hold f9 it says "hold f9 to loade quicksave" But even if i hold it for 30 sec nothing happens. What am i doing wrong?

 

Other than that game works like a charm! no Game-crashes what so ever

First steps.  Check your saves folder to see if you actually have any quick saves.  they will reside the the same folder as your Persistent.sfs file...

6 hours ago, Papa_Joe said:

First steps.  Check your saves folder to see if you actually have any quick saves.  they will reside the the same folder as your Persistent.sfs file...

Yeah there is 1 quiksave 1persistent and 1 default . Whene i hold f9 the text kinda strobes.
I'm not sure why it is not loading, but you can try deleting the quick save and then saving again... could be corrupted?
